alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 16 at 9:23PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY ALONG THE KUSKOKWIM RIVER NEAR KALSKAG... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...The Kuskokwim River near Kalskag. * WHEN...Until 700 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding is ongoing in Kalskag, with water over numerous roads, including the road to the airport and at the school, and under numerous homes. Other low lying areas may experience minor flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 811 PM AKDT, The River Watch Team reports high water in Kalskag due to nearby ice jams along the Kuskokwim River. Impounding water due to the ice jam will cause rapid river rises upstream. The main break up front is downstream of Lower Kalskag. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
